import react, {useState}from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; const cors = require('cors') function HookComponent(props){ const [name,setName]=useState({name:'',email:'',password:''}); function submit(e) { e.preventDefault(); console.log(name); axios.post('http://localhost/react/reactPhp/index.php/home/insert',{ email:name.email, password:name.password, name:name.name, }) .then(res => { console.log(res) }) } return(
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
submit(e)} > setName({...name,email:e.target.value})}/>
setName({...name,password:e.target.value})}/>
setName({...name,name:e.target.value})}/>
) } export default HookComponent
